name: The Snus Life Apparel Hoodie - Black
description:
*FREE POT with EVERY Hoodie :)*

 

Elevate your everyday style with 'The Snus Life' Hoodie, where exceptional craftsmanship and premium features merge seamlessly to redefine comfort and sophistication.

 

Printed 'The Snus Life' Logo on Front Adorned with 'The Snus Life' logo printed on the front . It's more than just branding; it is being a part of The Snus Life Family pioneering the fastest growing movement on the planet !

 

Luxurious Peached Fabric with a Soft-Feel Finish Wrap yourself in the velvety embrace of our peached fabric, expertly chosen to provide an unmatched softness and a luxurious touch. The soft-feel finish adds a tactile dimension to your attire, ensuring that every wear is an experience in comfort.

 

Waffle Knit Inner Hood Our distinctive waffle knit hood adds a touch of elegance to your look. This unique texture not only enhances the visual appeal of the hoodie but also showcases a commitment to elevated design.

 

High Polished, Nickel-Free Eyelets and Drawcord Ends Featuring high-polished, nickel-free eyelets and drawcord ends, a testament to our commitment to quality. These exquisite accents not only enhance the aesthetics but also demonstrate our unwavering dedication to perfection.

 

Polyester Dyed to Match Tubular Drawcord Our hoodie's tubular drawcord, polyester-dyed to perfection, seamlessly complements the overall design. Every detail matters, and this is where our obsession with perfection shines through.

 

Brushed Fleece Inner Experience unparalleled comfort with the brushed fleece inner lining. Designed to keep you cozy and warm, it ensures that this hoodie is your go-to choice for chilly days and when you need to hide away after a strong snus.

 

Twin-Needling Detailing for a Premium Finish Each stitch in this hoodie embodies our commitment to excellence. Twin-needling detailing not only enhances durability but also creates a high-quality finish that you can both see and feel.

 

Cut and Sew Two by One Ribbed Cuffs and Hem The two by one ribbed cuffs and hem are carefully cut and sewn to provide the perfect fit. Expect superior comfort, lasting style, and a perfect street-ready look.

 

Functional Kangaroo Pouch Pocket For added convenience and a touch of style, our hoodie comes equipped with a kangaroo pouch pocket, ensuring your essentials are always within reach.

 

'The Snus Life' Casual Wear Hoodie is more than just clothing; it's an embodiment of comfort, elegance, and individuality. Make a statement with your casual attire and elevate your everyday style to the next level. Welcome to a world where style meets substance effortlessly. This is not just fashion; it's a way of life. 

 

 

Vegan certified. BSCI certified. SEDEX certified. WRAP certified.
collection: Apparel
additionalInfoDescription1:
Size Guide / Washing instructions

Size (Chest)

Small: 34/36"

Medium 38/40"

Large 42/44"

XLarge 46/48"

 

Model is 5' 11" styling Medium

 

Washing Instructions Machine was at 30°. Wash with similar colours. Line dry. Do not Bleach. Medium Iron, do not tumble dry. Dry clean. Wash inside out. Tie drawcords before washing to avoid movement in wash.

name: The Snus Life Apparel Cap - Black
description:
Unleash your inner street style with 'The Snus Life' Streetwear Cap, a symbol of urban flair and premium quality. This cap is not just an accessory; it's a statement piece that's designed for the fashionable snus head.

 

Embroidered Snus Life Logo: Your Signature of Style Adorned with the iconic 'The Snus Life' logo beautifully embroidered, this cap doesn't just represent our brand; it represents your streetwear persona.

 

Crafted with 100% Heavy Brushed Cotton Drill Our cap is made from 100% heavy brushed cotton drill, ensuring durability and a robust feel that stands up to the rigors of everyday life. It's not just a cap; it's a testament to quality.

 

Sleek 6 Panel Design The 6-panel design of this cap is not just functional; it's a nod to contemporary streetwear aesthetics.

 

Pre-Curved Peak for Instant Style The pre-curved peak adds instant style and attitude to your look. No need for adjustments; just put it on and own the streets.

 

Stitched Ventilation Eyelets Ventilation is key, and our cap doesn't compromise. Stitched ventilation eyelets ensure you stay cool and comfortable while rocking your unique style.

 

Self-Fabric Strap with Tri-Glide Buckle Our cap features a self-fabric strap with a tri-glide buckle, offering a customizable fit that ensures the cap stays in place, no matter where life takes.

 

'The Snus Life' Streetwear Cap is more than just an accessory; it's a part of your identity. Elevate your streetwear game with a cap that combines style, durability, and comfort effortlessly. Welcome to a world where fashion meets function.
